byline.original: By EMILY STEEL and MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: French cable giant Altice is in discussions to acquire Suddenlink Communications, privately held American cable operator based in St Louis; if successful, bid would mark next step in Altice's acquisition-based, international expansion.
lead_paragraph: A deal for Suddenlink, based in St. Louis, could value the company at as much as $10 billion.

headline.main: Altice Bids for Cable Operator in St. Louis
headline.print_headline: Altice Bids for Cable Operator in St. Louis

snippet: A deal for Suddenlink, based in St. Louis, could value the company at as much as $10 billion.
